title: Freedmen's Bureau Records: William A. Staples to [Thomas P. Jackson], May 13, 1867
summary: William Staples writes on behalf of a woman who seeks the return of her son, Jack. Her son, only 15 years old, is living in Staunton and is employed without her permission. Staples' letter indicates that the woman seems to have trouble controlling her children, as the father is dead.
